de.mrapp.android.adapter

Class AdapterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.adapter.AdapterFactory

  • public final class AdapterFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    An utility class, which offers factory methods, which allow to initialize instances of the types NoChoiceListAdapter, SingleChoiceListAdapter, MultipleChoiceListAdapter, NoChoiceExpandableListAdapter, SingleChoiceExpandableListAdapter or MultipleChoiceExpandableListAdapter.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <GroupType,ChildType>
      NoChoiceExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType>      		 createExpandableListAdapter(android.content.Context context, ExpandableListDecorator<GroupType,ChildType> decorator)
      Creates and returns an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary group and child items.
      static <DataType> NoChoiceListAdapter<DataType> createListAdapter(android.content.Context context, ListDecorator<DataType> decorator)
      Creates and returns an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary items.
      static <GroupType,ChildType>
      MultipleChoiceExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType>      		 createMultipleChoiceExpandableListAdapter(android.content.Context context, SelectableExpandableListDecorator<GroupType,ChildType> decorator, ChoiceMode choiceMode)
      Creates and returns an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary group and child items, of which multiple items can be selected at once.
      static <DataType> MultipleChoiceListAdapter<DataType> createMultipleChoiceListAdapter(android.content.Context context, SelectableListDecorator<DataType> decorator)
      Creates and returns an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary items, of which multiple items can be selected at once.
      static <GroupType,ChildType>
      SingleChoiceExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType>      		 createSingleChoiceExpandableListAdapter(android.content.Context context, SelectableExpandableListDecorator<GroupType,ChildType> decorator, ChoiceMode choiceMode)
      Creates and returns an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary group and child items, of which only one can be selected at once.
      static <DataType> SingleChoiceListAdapter<DataType> createSingleChoiceListAdapter(android.content.Context context, SelectableListDecorator<DataType> decorator)
      Creates and returns an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary items, of which only one single item can be selected at once.

    • Method Detail

      • createListAdapter

        public static <DataType> NoChoiceListAdapter<DataType> createListAdapter(@NonNull
                                                                         android.content.Context context,
                                                                         @NonNull
                                                                         ListDecorator<DataType> decorator)
        Creates and returns an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary items.
        Type Parameters:
        DataType - The type of the adapter's underlying data
        Parameters:
        context - The context, the adapter belongs to, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        decorator - The decorator, which should be used to customize the appearance of the views, which are used to visualize the items of the adapter, as an instance of the type ListDecorator. The decorator may not be null
        Returns:
        The adapter, which has been created, as an instance of the type NoChoiceListAdapter

      • createSingleChoiceListAdapter

        public static <DataType> SingleChoiceListAdapter<DataType> createSingleChoiceListAdapter(@NonNull
                                                                                         android.content.Context context,
                                                                                         @NonNull
                                                                                         SelectableListDecorator<DataType> decorator)
        Creates and returns an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary items, of which only one single item can be selected at once.
        Type Parameters:
        DataType - The type of the adapter's underlying data
        Parameters:
        context - The context, the adapter belongs to, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        decorator - The decorator, which should be used to customize the appearance of the views, which are used to visualize the items of the adapter, as an instance of the type ListDecorator. The decorator may not be null
        Returns:
        The adapter, which has been created, as an instance of the type SingleChoiceListAdapter

        Returns:

      • createExpandableListAdapter

        public static <GroupType,ChildType> NoChoiceExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> createExpandableListAdapter(@NonNull
                                                                                                                   android.content.Context context,
                                                                                                                   @NonNull
                                                                                                                   ExpandableListDecorator<GroupType,ChildType> decorator)
        Creates and returns an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary group and child items.
        Type Parameters:
        GroupType - The type of the underlying data of the adapter's group items
        ChildType - The type of the underlying data of the adapter's child items
        Parameters:
        context - The context, the adapter belongs to, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        decorator - The decorator, which should be used to customize the appearance of the views, which are used to visualize the group and child items of the adapter, as an instance of the type ExpandableListDecorator. The decorator may not be null
        Returns:
        The adapter, which has been created, as an instance of the type ExpandableListAdapter

      • createSingleChoiceExpandableListAdapter

        public static <GroupType,ChildType> SingleChoiceExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> createSingleChoiceExpandableListAdapter(@NonNull
                                                                                                                                   android.content.Context context,
                                                                                                                                   @NonNull
                                                                                                                                   SelectableExpandableListDecorator<GroupType,ChildType> decorator,
                                                                                                                                   @NonNull
                                                                                                                                   ChoiceMode choiceMode)
        Creates and returns an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary group and child items, of which only one can be selected at once.
        Type Parameters:
        GroupType - The type of the underlying data of the adapter's group items
        ChildType - The type of the underlying data of the adapter's child items
        Parameters:
        context - The context, the adapter belongs to, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        decorator - The The decorator, which should be used to customize the appearance of the views, which are used to visualize the group and child items of the adapter, as an instance of the type SelectableExpandableListDecorator. The decorator may not be null
        choiceMode - The choice mode of the adapter as a value of the enum ChoiceMode. The choice mode may either be GROUPS_ONLY, CHILDREN_ONLY or GROUPS_AND_CHILDREN
        Returns:
        The adapter, which has been created, as an instance of the type SingleChoiceExpandableListAdapter

      • createMultipleChoiceExpandableListAdapter

        public static <GroupType,ChildType> MultipleChoiceExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> createMultipleChoiceExpandableListAdapter(@NonNull
                                                                                                                                       android.content.Context context,
                                                                                                                                       @NonNull
                                                                                                                                       SelectableExpandableListDecorator<GroupType,ChildType> decorator,
                                                                                                                                       @NonNull
                                                                                                                                       ChoiceMode choiceMode)
        Creates and returns an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary group and child items, of which multiple items can be selected at once.
        Type Parameters:
        GroupType - The type of the underlying data of the adapter's group items
        ChildType - The type of the underlying data of the adapter's child items
        Parameters:
        context - The context, the adapter belongs to, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        decorator - The The decorator, which should be used to customize the appearance of the views, which are used to visualize the group and child items of the adapter, as an instance of the type SelectableExpandableListDecorator. The decorator may not be null
        choiceMode - The choice mode of the adapter as a value of the enum ChoiceMode. The choice mode may either be GROUPS_ONLY, CHILDREN_ONLY or GROUPS_AND_CHILDREN
        Returns:
        The adapter, which has been created, as an instance of the type MultipleChoiceExpandableListAdapter
